sections.heading: Statehood Memorial; Nebraska State Historical Society; administration; maintenance; gifts, grants, bequests; accept
sections.text: The Nebraska State Historical Society shall be responsible for the administration and continued maintenance of the Nebraska Statehood Memorial and may accept gifts, grants, and bequest

82-117.Nebraska Statehood Memorial; Nebraska State Historical Society; administration; maintenance; gifts, grants, bequests; accept.

The Nebraska State Historical Society shall be responsible for the administration and continued maintenance of the Nebraska Statehood Memorial and may accept gifts, grants, and bequests for such purposes.

SourceLaws 1965, c. 556, ยง 4, p. 1839.
